import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import axiosInstance from "../utils/axios"; const AdminSidebar = ({ user }) => { const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState({ users: false, content: false }); const [reportStats, setReportStats] = useState({ pending: 0 }); // Fetch report stats when component mounts useEffect(() => { const fetchReportStats = async () => { try { const response = await axiosInstance.get('/api/reports/stats'); if (response.data) { setReportStats(response.data); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching report stats:', error); } }; fetchReportStats(); // Refresh stats every 60 seconds const interval = setInterval(fetchReportStats, 60000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const toggleSection = (section) => { setExpanded(prev => ({ ...prev, [section]: !prev[section] })); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Admin Panel

{/* User profile */}
{user?.firstName?.charAt(0) || 'A'}

{user?.firstName || 'Admin'} {user?.lastName || 'User'}

Administrator

{/* Navigation */}

Main

isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2.5 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2.5 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > Dashboard
{expanded.users && (
isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > All Users isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > Add User isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > Blocked Users
)}
{expanded.content && (
isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > Manage Posts isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > Reported Posts {reportStats.pending > 0 && ( {reportStats.pending} )} isActive ? "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg bg-green-600 text-white" : "group flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-lg text-green-100 hover:bg-green-600 hover:bg-opacity-50 transition-all duration-200" } > Comments
)}

); }; export default AdminSidebar;
